```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Let's import the `FAS_litters.csv` csv.

```{r}
litters_df =
  read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")

litters_df =
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)

litters_df
```

janitor是一个package，clean_names是其中的一个function

Import the same dataset using an absolute path

```{r}
litters_df_abs =
  read_csv("E:/DS1/DS-Lecture5/data_wrangling_i/data/FAS_litters.csv")

litters_df_abs =
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df_abs)

litters_df
```

```{r}
pups_df= 
  read_csv("data/FAS_pups.csv")

pups_df=
  janitor::clean_names(pups_df)

pups_df
```
